p: All PCR-positive individuals were from the Valdivia area. Overall vector-borne occurrence in Valdivia (5/15, 33.3%, 95% CI=6.3–60.3) was higher than on Chiloe Island (0/15, 0.0%, 95% CI=0–0) ( P=0.04). Age and sex were not significantly related to the probability of infection from any of the vector-borne pathogens evaluated in this study.
